name: WsnycExtendConnector

infos.name: Extend Integration by WSNYC
infos.description: Extend is a warranty service that allows storeowners to offer warranties for their products, through the Extend platform. The Extend platform integration by WSNYC for Shopware 6 makes it possible to offer Extend Warranty in Shopware stores. It allows the storeowners to provide a product protection service for replacements and repair through the warranties offered by Extend.
infos.installationManual:
Plugin manual is available here.


Before using the plugin, please set up an account with https://www.extend.com/
infos.shortDescription: Enhance your Shopware store with Extend's solution for improved product protection. This integration offers a seamless experience that benefits both merchants and customers.
infos.highlights:
Integrates Shopware 6 with Extend platform - a better product protection experience that is a win for both merchants and their customers.
Automatic Contracts and Leads creation.
Automatic sync of orders.
Sync of products.
infos.features:
The plugin provides an integration between Shopware 6 and Extend platforms.
Offer Extend warranties on Shopware 6 store.
Automatically syncs orders with Extend based on Flow Builder actions.
Allows for setting up custom SKU Format for Extend Plan Line Item using the provided variables.
Includes Sandbox Mode.
Includes Test Mode (sending the orders to Extend with the "isTest" flag - this determines whether the contract is a test contract vs. live contract. With Test Mode enabled, the transactions should not be charged by Extend at the end of the billing cycle).
Includes debug mode and a grid with logs.
Includes additional grids for product sync and order sync.
Includes a feature for manual sync trigger.
Includes a customizable Order wait period.
Automatic Contracts creation.
Automatic Leads creation.

changelog.text:
• Features added:

    • The plugin provides an integration between Shopware 6 and Extend platforms.
    • Offer Extend warranties on Shopware 6 store.
    • Automatically syncs orders with Extend based on Flow Builder actions.
    • Allows for setting up custom SKU Format for Extend Plan Line Item using the provided variables.
    • Includes Sandbox Mode.
    • Includes Test Mode.
    • Includes debug mode and a grid with logs.
    • Includes additional grids for product sync and order sync.
    • Includes a feature for manual sync trigger.
    • Includes a customizable Order wait period.
    • Automatic Contracts creation.
    • Automatic Leads creation.
